description: Gestion des accès privilégiés à la société Farm_credit Canada
full_summary:
# Privileged Access Management (PAM) Request for Proposals (RFP)
## Reference Information
*   Reference Number: PW-23-01025167
*   Solicitation Number: 2022-CU-008
*   Publication Date: February 8, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: March 22, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (CST, Saskatchewan)

## Overview
Farm Credit Canada (FCC) is seeking a suitable vendor to optimize and mature its Privileged Access Management (PAM) posture by implementing a PAM solution for its diverse set of systems.

## Background
Canada's leading agriculture and food lender, FCC, operates a cloud-centric organization with over 2,500 users. The company's privileged access is currently managed using traditional methods, involving manual processes and opportunities for automation, optimization, and enhanced security.

## Requirements
FCC needs a PAM solution to mitigate risk and establish a well-defined audit trail related to privileged access to its systems. The solution must provide PAM capabilities suitable for modern architectures, legacy architectures, and custom applications.

## RFP Document
The RFP document outlines the scope of work, evaluation criteria, and timelines for the project. Vendors interested in receiving a copy of the RFP document must contact Chris Ugochukwu, Procurement and Vendor Manager at procurement@fcc.ca.

## Notice
*   Responses to this RFP are due on March 22, 2023 @ 2:00 PM (CST, Saskatchewan)
*   Vendors may request a copy of the RFP document through FCC's designated procurement contact.
*   Registration for the list of interested suppliers (LIS) on buyandsell.gc.ca is not a prerequisite for receiving the RFP document.
*   This is a competitive RFP, and FCC reserves the right to cancel the project at any time.

## Trade Agreements
The project is open to vendors who meet the specified trade agreements, including:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization (WTO)

## Languages
The RFP documents will be exclusively in English, but responses can be submitted in French. Language support will be provided as needed. [^1]
